name: Flying Limo City 2016 Simulator – Future Limousine Parking with Air Plane Driving Controls
name_original: Flying Limo City 2016 Simulator – Future Limousine Parking with Air Plane Driving Controls
description:
Combo of Futuristic Flying Car and Limo driving
Flying Limo car simulator 2016 takes you on a time travel to Futuristic urban city. Enjoy driving your limousine/ limo in the air. Drive like super sports car and do some limousine/ limo stunts and drifts in the sky just like flying an airplane. A new addition to the futuristic flying car games.

Burn the asphalt…. Race your limousine in the urban city
Flying limousine driving will take you on a new driving simulation. Enjoy your limozeen ride in the city. Convert it into a flying limo car to overcome obstacles. Collect the coins in the sky to earn bonus and unlock some stunning flying limos.

Catch the Flying Limo Car Driving Fever
Though of driving Limo cars like airplane or quadocopter when stuck in city traffic or running late for a party? Here’s your chance to dive a flying limo or racing your flying car in the air over the blue skies. A perfect limo simulator game for you! Drive your American muscle limousine like a super sports car or fly your car like an airplane. It’s upto you.

Enjoy a realistic flying car simulator as a limo Chauffeur. Be the best limousine driver in the latest limo driving simulator. Feel like a professional aircraft flight pilot. Download the Flying Limo City 2016 Simulator today.
